title: Technological frames, CIOs, and Artificial Intelligence in public administration: A socio-cognitive exploratory study in Spanish local governments
research_description: The study explores the socio-cognitive approaches of CIOs in Spanish local governments regarding AI adoption. The authors analyze the technological frames that influence AI policies and strategies in public administrations.
research_results: CIOs tend to focus on the technological aspects of AI while overlooking social and ethical considerations. The study provides insights into the frames that shape AI strategies in the public sector.
future_research: Future studies could expand on the comparison of technological frames in different regions and sectors, exploring their impact on AI policy and strategy success.
